price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Sͻ no mu, ensuro. Yεbεsan de no aba sεdeε na ͻteε kane no ara.
arabic: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla khudh'hā walā takhaf sanuʿīduhā sīratahā al-ūlā
